response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic vision. We are confident that once you experience the benefits of our product, its true worth will exceed even your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
